document.full_text: the u.s. dollar slid to a 3-year low against a basket of major currencies and asian stocks jumped to a 3-year high on thursday, as investors scrambled to get in front of upward momentum in higher-yielding assets, particularly in emerging markets.
document.title: dollar hits 3-yr low; gold, asian stocks march on
lines_and_colors: the u.s. dollar slid to a 3-year low against a basket of major currencies and asian stocks jumped to a 3-year high on thursday, as investors scrambled to get in front of upward momentum in higher-yielding assets, particularly in emerging markets.
